title: Verizon Media CDN Playback Monitoring
body:
Verizon Media developers through doctorate research developed a revolutionary method of video playback monitoring derived directly through the content delivery network. The researchers & product teams and I wanted to further enhance the usefulness of the research by developing an interface of metric visualizations and interactions that customers use to interact with the data, make correlations, and solve playback problems in record time.  

![](/images/uploads/cdn-monitoring.jpg)
